bibl.title: Supplementum Magicum. Vol. II (Suppl. Mag. II).
bibl.note: Addenda and Corrigenda to Vol. I, 1990. - Applied Magic: Curses, Pagan (52-58); - Curses, Christian (59-62); - Charms to Win Favor (63-64); - Divinatory Charms (65-66). - Texts of Uncertain Nature (67-69). - Formularies (70-100).
bibl.seg: DANIEL Robert W. and Franco MALTOMINI (edited with translations and notes by), Supplementum Magicum. Vol. II (Suppl. Mag. II). (Papyrologica Coloniensia. XVI, 2.)
Opladen, Westdeutscher Verlag, 1992, 8Â°, xiv-372 pp., figg. et 13 pll. ISBN 3-531-09933-7. DM 118.

Addenda and Corrigenda to Vol. I, 1990. - Applied Magic: Curses, Pagan (52-58); - Curses, Christian (59-62); - Charms to Win Favor (63-64); - Divinatory Charms (65-66). - Texts of Uncertain Nature (67-69). - Formularies (70-100).
C.R. par William M. Brashear, CP 91 (1996) pp. 373-375.
